title: 77: Trials Looming and Is anyone dealing?
description:
We are getting closer to trial time.
The murder trial of Alex Murdaugh may start in January. Alex's attorneys attempted a legal maneuver that the prosecutors reject.
Russell Lafitte, the banker, is set to stand trial in November on federal charges.
Cousin Eddie Smith's jailhouse phone calls may not be released.
One of Alex's private island's is sold.
We discuss those topics and more with our legal analyst, John Snyder.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
itunes:author: Matt Harris and Seton Tucker
